titleStmt.title: A proclamation concernyng eatyng of vvhite meates made the III. day of February, the XXXIII yere of the reygne of the kynges most royall maiesty.
Proclamations. 1542-02-03
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Because of scarcity, temporarily dispenses with laws of abstinence during Lent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
